tool_description: How many points did the DAX40 stock index gain or lose each month (during this period: Jan-Aug, 2022). This API will get the data that will answer that question.
name: DAX
title: DAX

api_list.name: DAX point changes for each month (January-August, 2022)
api_list.description: Gets the actual points, gains and losses for each individual month.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dax1.p.rapidapi.com/points"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dax1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dax1.p.rapidapi.com/points"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dax1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
